title: Broporo deserves a raise
body:
Just went over the red tracker for the past day and I noticed that Broporo has been very busy responding to comments and complaints on the forums and doing his best to solve customer problems.  And on an Easter weekend no less.  (BTW, no, I am not related to him in any way nor do I know him directly or indirectly.)

I just wanted to pass along a warm fuzzy and a positive comment to someone, who is obviously working hard behind the scenes to keep the game going over the long weekend.

Thanks for your hard work, Broporo.

replies.body:
Here here, a Riot employee _that actually listens and responds to players in a timely fashion_ (even if he can't always directly help/solve an issue).

#Raise their $
Keep up the good work Broporo!{{summoner:31}}
